column1: #text=The other day I went to the grocery store to buy enough food for me to eat for several days .
#text=Before I left , I thought about what I might want to eat over the next few days .
#text=I looked through my recipes and decided on what sort of food to buy .
#text=I got a piece of paper and a pencil and wrote down all the food that I would need to buy to make these meals .
#text=Once I felt my list was complete , I gathered some bags and drove to the store .
#text=I took a shopping cart and pushed it into the store .
#text=In the store , I looked at my list again and thought about what foods might be near the front of the store .
#text=The front of the store had fruits and vegetables , so I looked for fruits and vegetables on my list so I could pick them up together .
#text=I walked down the aisle and found the items on my list and put them in my shopping cart .
#text=I put a check mark next to each item after I found it .
#text=When I got to the next aisle , I looked at my list again and did the same thing .
#text=I thought about the foods that would be in this aisle and found them together .
#text=After going down all the aisles , I saw that every item on my list had a check mark , so I knew I was done shopping .
#text=I pushed my shopping cart to the checkout lane and gave each item to the cashier .
#text=He scanned them and told me how much money the food costs .
#text=I gave him enough money to pay for the food and then helped him put everything into my bags .
#text=Then I carried the bags to my car and drove home .
#text=I spent the next few minutes putting all the food away where it belongs , and I was all done shopping .
